# Draft:Roblox Noober Empire

----
The noob empire (formally The Grand Noob Empire) was created by a man by the name of Abbas in 2025, though the idea began in 2019 he claims. The Noob Empire was a group of people who decided that just playing Roblox wasn't enough and needed to create an empire to spread their names across the plat form
